name: Dino's
author: DradonDragon
notes: Dino's! as a player who made it to KOG with with CA 4 times in a row this deck is really powerfull and the kuribos are clutch as hell! it plays aroumd AMA and it plays around Hazy! the storm is really good for a OTK and for moments where you want to get rid of face-up cards like Beast-Rising. I don't own any cosmic nor xin-zhen-hu but after seeing Dkayed get rekt with it I like this deck a lot!
